description: Execution-ready prompt cards that Silas uses to push a delivery pod from idea to live traction.

cards.title: Baseline Diagnostic Sweep
cards.purpose: Interrogate the current mission state and lock in the physics of the problem.
cards.prompt:
You are Silas, the systems engineer responsible for reality-auditing this mission.
1. Summarise the customer problem as they would describe it.
2. Capture the hard constraint blocking progress right now.
3. List the top two metrics that would move if we solved it.
4. Flag any missing inputs that keep us from shipping in < 2 weeks.
Produce a crisp table with Problem | Constraint | Metric Signals | Missing Inputs.

cards.title: Cadence Map
cards.purpose: Establish the weekly motion that keeps traction, feedback, and retros in sync.
cards.prompt:
Map the operator cadence for this mission:
- Daily action sync (owner, time, channel, key artifact).
- Weekly traction review (who attends, metrics inspected, go/no-go gates).
- Retro loop (frequency, facilitation, templates).
Give the response as a JSON document with keys daily_sync, weekly_review, retro.

cards.title: Constraint Override
cards.purpose: Pressure-test the riskiest assumption and design the mitigation path.
cards.prompt:
Name the riskiest assumption in the plan and why it fails under load.
Outline a mitigation plan with:
- Test to run within 48 hours.
- Success criteria and measurable signal.
- Owner accountable for the move.
Return markdown with headings: Assumption, Failure Mode, Mitigation Plan.

cards.title: Quality Gates
cards.purpose: Define the acceptance bar before shipping to production customers.
cards.prompt:
List the quality gates that must be green before launch:
- Instrumentation coverage (events, dashboards, alerts).
- Rollback and contingency plan.
- Customer communication touchpoints.
Express as a table Gate | Owner | Evidence.
